article.title: Air Force HQ Taps Dominguez as Mobilization Assistant
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Col. Brian E. Dominguez, USAF, has been nominated to the rank of brigadier general and assignment as mobilization assistant to the director of operational planning, policy and strategy, deputy chief of staff for operations, plans and requirements, Headquarters U.S. Air Force, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.
